text: Iljaz Prokshi (Serbo-Croat: Iljaz Prokši), born in 1949 in Kosovo, died 28 April 2007 in Pristina, was an ethnic Albanian writer and poet.Worldmark Encyclopedia of Cultures and Daily Life: Europe (2009) ("In recent years, Kosovo has produced a number of prominent writers, including novelist Iljaz Prokshi ...") He studied Albanian language and literature in the University of Pristina. Prokshi is mainly known for the novel Fundi I Zemerimit (The End of Disgruntlement), a bestseller and winner of The Book of the Year prize . ==References== ==External links== *see author's biography and his literary work *Biography Category:1949 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Kosovan writers Category:Kosovan poets Category:20th-century poets
title: Iljaz Prokshi
